nodes.text: An individual served as the Sith apprentice of the Sith Lord Darth Gorgos, a member of the ruling Dark Council of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War between the Empire and the Galactic Republic. Sometime after 3653 BBY, Darth Gorgos ordered the construction the Spires of Victory, a sculpture in Kaas City on the Empire's capital of Dromund Kaas, in celebration of the Empire's victory over the Republic during the Great Galactic War. Gorgos's apprentice killed the female Dark Lord of the Sith before the Spires's completion, assuming Gorgos's place on the Dark Council and overseeing the completion of the monument.

Darth Gorgos and her apprentice was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Spires of Victory in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011, though the apprentice's gender and species remained unspecified.
